entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning then changing to periods of snow near noon and ending in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
